paragraphs: Hi! I'm Prabanjan â€” a CSE undergrad passionate about creative engineering, visual storytelling, and AI-powered experiences. I bring tech and imagination together through circuits, code, and cinematic design.
From building 4-bit logic circuits and YOLOv8 object detectors to crafting AI-assisted Blender scenes, I blend precision with creativity. Letâ€™s build something bold, expressive, and intelligent!

items.name: Wildlife Detection with YOLOv8
description: Custom-trained YOLOv8 model using Roboflow and OpenCV.
Detects animals like tigers, zebras, and rhinos in real time.
Annotated dataset and live webcam inference.

items.name: 4-Bit Password Verifier Circuit
description: Designed using 74-series TTL ICs and Tinkercad simulation.
Custom voltage regulation for 5V logic-level compatibility.
Verilog model for circuit logic verification.

Scene includes lighting, props, and volumetric fog.
Inspired by WALLÂ·E's post-apocalyptic waste world.
